title: Poké Talk
descriptionTwo: Web Application for a user who wants to connect with other users through discussion about their pokémon

title: Mechanique Blog
descriptionTwo: Web Application for a user who wants a blog site so that they can publish articles, blog posts, and their thoughts and opinions

title: Poké Pound
descriptionTwo: Web application for a user who wants to adopt or rehome a pet efficiently

title: Find A Beer
descriptionTwo: Web application for a traveler who wants to see the local microbreweries in a city as well as the nearby restrooms so that they may plan an outing

title: Weather Dashboard
descriptionTwo: Web application for a traveler who wants to see the weather outlook for multiple cities so that they are able to plan a trip accordingly

title: Employee Tracker
descriptionTwo: CLI for business owners who want to be able to view and manage their departments, roles, and employees so that they can organize and plan their business

title: Team Profile Generator
descriptionTwo: CLI for a manager who wants to generate a webpage that displays their team's basic info so that they have quick access to their emails and GitHub profiles
